bug.author: abhilashshakti
bug.summary: Link to TensorBoard: Graph Visualization is broken
bug.description:
I am reading about tensorboard here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/r1/summaries>https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/r1/summaries</denchmark-link>
On this page the link to is broken. This is the link: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/guide/graph_viz>https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/guide/graph_viz</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhilashshakti>@abhilashshakti</denchmark-link> I agree the link is not working. We will update soon. In the mean time you can take a look at the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard>TensorBoard: Graph Visualization</denchmark-link> . Thanks!

Thanks for the report <denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhilashshakti>@abhilashshakti</denchmark-link>
I've sent a PR with a fix, but remember that you can too. The github edit button makes thios sort of thing easy to fix without ever leaving your browser.
Thanks for looking into the request.

Thanks for the ping! The docs for TensorFlow 1.x, including the one that you mention (<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/r1/summaries>https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/r1/summaries</denchmark-link> ), are now hosted on GitHub rather than tensorflow.org. The tensorflow.org link now redirects to the new source of truth, where the “TensorBoard: Graph Visualization” link works: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/blob/master/docs/r1/summaries.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/blob/master/docs/r1/summaries.md</denchmark-link>

Awesome, thanks! <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
On Mon, Dec 2, 2019 at 12:20 PM William Chargin ***@***.***> wrote: Thanks for the ping! The docs for TensorFlow 1.x, including the one that you mention (https://www.tensorflow.org/tensorboard/r1/summaries), are now hosted on GitHub rather than tensorflow.org. The tensorflow.org link now redirects to the new source of truth, where the “TensorBoard: Graph Visualization” link works: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/blob/master/docs/r1/summaries.md
